headline: West Michigan based ESPEC North America, Inc. Joins Consumers Energy's Renewable Energy Program
summary: Consumers Energy and ESPEC North America, Inc. announced a partnership to power the West Michigan based environmental and reliability testing equipment manufacturing company with clean energy and bring new renewable energy into Michigan's electric grid.

raw.headline: West Michigan based ESPEC North America, Inc. Joins Consumers Energy's Renewable Energy Program
raw.summary: Consumers Energy and ESPEC North America, Inc. announced a partnership to power the West Michigan based environmental and reliability testing equipment manufacturing company with clean energy and bring new renewable energy into Michigan's electric grid.

headline: Southern's Unit Tests Full Supply Chain Emissions Tracking Tool
summary: SO's subsidiary SouthStar becomes the first U.S. retail energy marketer to pilot MethaneScout, boosting emissions transparency.
